hint: Name of table to retrieve data from - e.g. task
name: table
label: Table used to query data

hint: Field name to use for the image caption
name: name_field
label: Field name in table to use for the image caption

hint: Additional text for sub-caption - e.g. Expiration Date
name: subcaption_field
label: Field name in table to use for the image sub-caption

hint: Field name in table for storing an image on the record
name: image_field
label: Field name in table  to use for the image

hint: Limit query results to current user. Expects field named - assigned_to
name: limit_to_user
label: Limit to User - Limit query results to current user. Expects field named - assigned_to

hint: Additional query parameters to help reduce data set
name: encoded_query
label: Additional Data Filter - using Encoded Query format, e.g.  active=true^start_date=today

hint: Service Portal target page to view data in a larger list
name: list_page
label: List Page Target - Target Page for View All panel header link

hint: Service Portal target page to view or edit an individual item
name: detail_page
label: Detail Page Target - Detail page target for item menu 'View Details' link

hint: View to use when target detail page is a form
name: view
label: View name used by Detail Page Target - leave empty to use default view

hint: Easily make a panel more meaningful to a particular context by adding any of the contextual state classes.
name: context
label: Bootstrap Panel's Contextual alternatives - changes the header and border to Bootstrap defined context colors

name: panel_button
label: Show as items as clickable panel button

name: panel_button_context
label: Clickable Panel Button context - Bootstrap Panel's Contextual alternatives - changes the background to Bootstrap defined context colors
